content:
While I'm reviewing the technical artifacts, is it a problem that the canonicalURI for the Medication Status CODE SYSTEM has ValueSet in it? http://build.fhir.org/codesystem-medication-statement-status.html
This was changed since the Sept Ballot version, where it was http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-statement-status
(I also asked this question in the committers stream)
Effect is the canonicalURI is the same for both the CodeSystem and the ValueSet
CodeSystem and ValueSet are not allowed to have the same URI
Sounds like we might need a technical correction for this one then.
The tooling is supposed to pick up on errors like that. @Grahame Grieve ?
I don’t know why it hasn’t. A very serious techical error. Has someone fixed this?
Ping
I assume that Pharmacy WG will see about fixing this?
@Melva Peters ?
I will get this fixed.
@Grahame Grieve can this be fixed now?

@Grahame Grieve
I have fixed the issue with the canonical status uri and did a pull request which is ready to merge. I wasn't sure if I should be merging it at this point. I'm heading out on a trip early tomorrow morning. Can you merge this in, assuming it is okay to merge?
Thanks, looks like this was merged I to master, I'll check it a little later today.

Yep, it has resolved my issue with code generations, however there is a misspelling Admninistration is in the name/title for several of the ValueSet/CodeSystem resources in medications.

  • medication-admin-status
  • med-admin-perform-function
  • medication-admin-category
    Its not urgent, but since you've already fixed the other, the spelling should probably be done too.
I'll create a tracker and fix.
thanks for fixing. (btw it was mandatory to fix the URL - I would have had to further down the track)

http://build.fhir.org/codesystem-medication-statement-status.html
Is still showing the Canonical with the ValueSet name in the URL - I thought this was updated?
I see, its in the pull request Melva still has open, are you going to approve that one @Melva Peters ?

I thought both had been merged. Can you check again? If it is still an issue, I'll have to look again. I thought I had fixed. I'm just about to board a flight and won't be able to check again until mid afternoon Eastern time.

Expletive! There's another of these.
http://build.fhir.org/codesystem-medicationrequest-status.html
Can I have approval to fix this one too?
@Grahame Grieve , @Melva Peters
http://build.fhir.org/codesystem-medicationrequest-intent.html
(and this one too)
I'll create a fix for them both and create a pull request but not complete it until I get replies...
what's this another of?

A code system (x2) with a canonicalURI that is the same as its valueset.
See my pull request for the exact fix.
The code system and value set have the same canonicalURI.
Ah yes please fix that
Okay by me, but not sure if it's okay to merge the pull request.
since Grahame already said that he agrees, I think it should be fine to merge
yes
